subject: Re: [junit] Please introduce a GUI test tools??
msgSnippet: ... ...and for examples on using them well, get a copy of _TDD: A Practical Guide_. It s still the only TDD/JUnit book that shows us how to test-drive a
messageBody:
Ilja Preuss wrote:
> > Marathon
> > Jacareto
> > Abbot
> > Pounder
> > Jemmy Module
> > JFCUnit
>
> I only know Jemmy and JFCUnit, and from those two I'd definitely prefer
> Jemmy.

...and for examples on using them well, get a copy of _TDD: A Practical
Guide_. It's still the only TDD/JUnit book that shows us how to
test-drive a desktop GUI.

You also might want to find a Yahoo! group called
"testfirstuserinterfaces" and ask there.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
